subject: Science
title: Dinosaur Discovery
learningObjectives: Identify at least two different types of dinosaurs (e.g., T-Rex, Triceratops).
Understand that dinosaurs lived a long time ago and are now extinct.

content.body: Let's travel back in time to learn about dinosaurs! Dinosaurs were giant reptiles that lived a long, long time ago.

content.alt: A friendly T-Rex and a Triceratops.

content.body: Some dinosaurs were plant-eaters, and some were meat-eaters. We learn about them by studying their fossils.

questions.question: Which of these is a famous dinosaur?
What do we call the preserved remains of dinosaurs?

content.body: ¡Viajemos en el tiempo para aprender sobre los dinosaurios! Los dinosaurios eran reptiles gigantes que vivieron hace mucho, mucho tiempo.

questions.question: ¿Cuál de estos es un dinosaurio famoso?
¿Cómo llamamos a los restos preservados de los dinosaurios?
